body_html:
Similair issue:
Tensoflow-gpu 1.8
Windows 10
Python 3.6
Cuda 9.0
cuDNN 7.1.4

I knew that I would not upgrade. I still can’t solve it now.

ok，I think I have solved this problem. I change Tensoflow-gpu 1.8 to Tensoflow 1.8. Well Done！
